definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: that with which one is covered, covering;—sf. [[מְסֻכַָתְָָ]] Ez Eze 28:13 (so Baer Ginsb; van d. H. ´[[מְסֻכּ]]) all precious stones were thy covering (= thou wast covered with them);—the tradition is strong in favour of Raphē, but sense favours deriv. from [[סכך]].
